panels.description: Shows readiness of pods in the namespace
panels.title: Pod readiness

panels.description: Shows general throughput of processing, writing, exporting and importing together
panels.title: Throughput per type

panels.description: Shows the processing queue size over time. Processing queue defines, what is already appended but not yet processed by the stream processor.
panels.title: Processing Queue size

panels.description: Shows how many records are not exported yet.

targets.expr: max(max (zeebe_log_appender_last_committed_position{namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition"}) by(partition) - max (zeebe_exporter_last_exported_position{namespace=~"$namespace", partition=~"$partition", exporter="elasticsearch"}) by(partition))

panels.title: Exporting Queue size

panels.description: Shows the current import queue size, how many import bulks are in flight and need to be processed
panels.title: Import queue size

panels.description:
AVG CPU usage in a second per pod and container.

container_cpu_usage_seconds_total reports the container CPU usage time per second. How much of a second was used by the container on a certain CPU.

It can be over 1 second (as we might use several CPUs). Indicating how much of a CPU second (or in this sense how many CPUs) was/is used.
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description:
The average percentage of CPU periods where the container ran but was throttled (stopped from running the whole CPU period).


container_cpu_cfs_periods_total -
Number of elapsed enforcement period intervals
container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total -
Number of throttled period intervals	

https://github.com/google/cadvisor/blob/master/docs/storage/prometheus.md
https://stackoverflow.com/a/67316429/2165134
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UE7QX98-kO0
panels.title: CPU Throttling (AVG)

panels.description: Shows the time (latency) between writing the command to the dispatcher, processing, exporting, and then importing the record.
panels.title: General Latency (avg)

panels.description: Takes the avg of all processed records per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Write-to-Processing latency (avg)

panels.description: The average latency it takes from writing a record to exporting it.
panels.title: Write-to-Exporting latency (avg)

panels.description: Takes the avg of all imported records per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Write-to-Importing latency (avg)

panels.description: The latency of writing the record to processing it in seconds.
panels.title: Write-to-Processing latency

panels.description: The latency it takes from writing a record to exporting it.
panels.title: Write-to-Exporting latency

panels.description: Takes the avg of all imported records per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Write-to-Importing latency (avg)

panels.description: The AVG duration of processing a record (in seconds)
panels.title: Processing duration in seconds (avg)

panels.description: The AVG duration of exporting a record (in seconds)
panels.title: Exporting duration in seconds (avg)
Elasticsearch Exporter max. record buffer time

panels.description: The time it takes for the importer to read an record on average from ES
panels.title: Importing: read duration

panels.description: Time the import writer thread needs on average to process an ImportBatch (containing several Zeebe records).
panels.title: Import processing duration (AVG)

panels.description: The time it takes to write the bulk requests (during importing) to ES on average.
panels.title: Importing: write duration (avg)

panels.description: Life time of a ImportBatch, that has been scheduled by the reader threads into the import queue, until the processing is done by the writer thread
panels.title: ImportBatch lifetime (avg)

panels.description: Takes the avg of all completed processes per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Completed Processes per second

panels.description: Takes the avg of all processed records per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Processed Records

panels.description: Takes the avg of all exported records per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Exported Records

panels.description: Takes the avg of all imported records per second over the given time range.
panels.title: Imported Records

panels.description: AVG of ES exporter flush
panels.title: Elasticsearch Exporter Flush rate
